mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfTmprLagQtyOrd Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ TMPR_ORD_NO , MBR_NO , DLV_SHOP_ID , SKU_NO , SALE_AMT , ORD_QTY , ADDRSE_POST_NO , ADDRSE_BASE_ADDR , ADDRSE_DETAIL_ADDR , ADDRSE_NM , ADDRSE_TEL_NO , ADDRSE_MOBIL_NO , DLV_MEMO FROM INF_TMPR_LAG_QTY_ORD WHERE 1 = 1
